system.description: When you fight savagely and without restraint, roll +Force.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your reckless assault leaves you open. You suffer their full attack and face additional consequences.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You deal devastating damage, but choose one: you take their attack in return, you damage something you didn't mean to, or you lose control and can't stop fighting.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You overwhelm them completely. Deal extra damage and choose whether to show mercy or continue the assault.
